CustomField.description: List of Contract Field API names to be shown in CPQ when viewing a Contract records configuration. Sections can be created by inputting a label preceded by the '#' character (e.g. #Header). Blank spaces can be created by inputting a value that is not a valid field API name.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of Contract Field API names to be shown in CPQ when viewing a Contract records configuration. Sections can be created by inputting a label preceded by the '#' character (e.g. #Header). Blank spaces can be created by inputting a value that is not a valid field API name.
CustomField.label: Contract View Display Fields
